Dcoument_x0020_Title: Low-Complexity Lossless and Near-Lossless  Multispectral and Hyperspectral Image Compression
Description0: The Recommended Standard for multispectral and hyperspectral image compression specifies a data compression algorithm applied to digital three-dimensional image data from payload instruments, such as multispectral and hyperspectral imagers. Lossless and near-lossless methods are specified, along with a format for storing the compressed data.  The current version of this document contains all updates through technical corrigendum 3, dated February 2021.
